name: MLH HackCon 2026
description: MLH's annual conference for hackathon organizers features a showcase where experienced professionals judge top student projects from the past year.

name: Opportunity Hack 2026
description: 48-hour hackathon pairing developers with nonprofits. Judges evaluate tech solutions addressing real challenges faced by charitable organizations.

name: SF AI Innovation Hackathon
description: Judges needed for a 200-person AI hackathon during San Francisco's HumanX conference week. Evaluate projects on technical innovation and real-world applicability.

name: HackUNCP 2026
description: University hackathon seeking industry professionals to mentor student teams and evaluate final presentations. Great for first-time judges.

name: Climate Hack Global 2026
description: Global virtual hackathon focused on AI solutions for climate change. Seeking judges with expertise in sustainability, ML, or environmental science.

name: TreeHacks 2026
description: Stanford's flagship hackathon with 1,500+ participants. Judges evaluate projects across healthcare, sustainability, and education tracks.

name: Web3 Builder Jam
description: Virtual Web3 hackathon seeking experienced blockchain developers and researchers to judge DeFi, NFT, and infrastructure projects.

name: HealthTech Hack Boston
description: Weekend hackathon at MIT focused on healthcare innovation. Judges with clinical, biotech, or health-tech backgrounds evaluate patient-facing solutions.

name: Hack for Good Atlanta
description: Civic tech hackathon building tools for local nonprofits and government agencies. Judges from tech and public sector backgrounds welcome.

name: AI Agents Hackathon
description: Online hackathon exploring autonomous AI agents. Seeking AI researchers and senior engineers to evaluate agent architectures and safety approaches.

name: Hack the North 2026
description: Canada's biggest hackathon with 1,000+ hackers. Industry mentors guide teams and judges evaluate projects across open-ended tracks.

name: PennApps 2026
description: One of America's oldest and largest collegiate hackathons. Judges with industry experience evaluate projects across multiple verticals.

name: Threat Modeling Hackathon 2026
description: Security-focused hackathon where teams build threat models for open-source projects. Mentors with AppSec or security architecture experience guide teams.

name: Women in Tech Hackathon
description: 48-hour virtual hackathon promoting diversity in tech. Judges and mentors from all backgrounds welcome. Focus on inclusive technology solutions.

name: NASA Space Apps Challenge 2026
description: Annual global hackathon using NASA open data. Local and virtual judges needed across dozens of city chapters worldwide.

name: LogiHack 2026
description: Corporate hackathon focused on supply chain and logistics optimization. Judges with operations research or ML backgrounds evaluate solutions.

name: Cal Hacks 2026
description: UC Berkeley's massive hackathon with 2,000+ hackers. Industry professionals judge projects and mentor teams across all experience levels.

name: FinTech Fusion NYC
description: Wall Street meets Web3. Judges with finance, trading, or fintech backgrounds evaluate projects spanning DeFi, payments, and AI-driven financial tools.
